about_the_game:
No Exit is small chapter based indie horror game. You'll have to face challenging enemies, and perhaps make some allies, to escape this crooked dimension that you're trapped in. 

Jump from place to place. Escape or fight. Even though some of them thought your fate is sealed, you can prove them wrong... 

Find the Exit.

Designed for casual horror fans, it offers a spooky atmosphere with plenty of casual scares. Players can expect intense boss encounters with dynamic visuals and cool music, along with a story that unfolds gradually. With each chapter, the game will challenge you with grander events and much more difficult challenges. Can you survive long enough, to learn the truth?

You and your friend have always been the best urban explorers in town, seeking out abandoned places and uncovering their secrets. Your latest target was an old, forsaken warehouse rumored to be haunted. However, while you were away on vacation, your friend’s curiosity got the better of him. Unable to wait, he ventured in alone, and now he’s missing. Determined to find him, you enter the decaying warehouse, only to realize that it’s not just an empty building. Now, you find yourself in a twisted pocket dimension, with strange creatures constantly trying to find and kill you. Can you escape?

Game Features:

  • Fast-paced boss encounters, with each having different gimmicks and mechanics.

  • Chases, in which you have to rush at breakneck speed. One slip, you're dead.

  • Funky music, synced to ingame events.

  • Actual creepy moments. Keeping you mostly on your edge.

  • A rapidly developing plot. Make allies, enemies and try to find your way out.


"Let us... strike a deal. How does that sound?"

name: NO EXIT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Graphics: MSI GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: No Exit is small chapter based indie horror game. You'll have to face challenging enemies, and perhaps make some allies, to escape this crooked dimension that you're trapped in.
